## Math (MathJax)

Inline math: \( \mathrm{KL}(q \| p) = \sum_x q(x)\log \frac{q(x)}{p(x)} \).

Display math:

\[
\mathcal{L}(\theta) = \mathbb{E}_{(x,y)\sim\mathcal{D}}\left[-\log p_\theta(y \mid x)\right].
\]
